mapper.select: SELECT beforTotalNum, beforDataDate, afterTotalNum, afterDataDate FROM ( SELECT sum(TOTALNUM) as beforTotalNum,DATADATE as beforDataDate FROM FREEZEWATEREVERYDAYDATA WHERE DATADATE = #{beforDate,jdbcType=DATE} and TotalNum is not null and TotalNum != -2147483648 group by DATADATE ) a join ( SELECT sum(TOTALNUM) as afterTotalNum,DATADATE as afterDataDate FROM FREEZEWATEREVERYDAYDATA WHERE DATADATE = #{afterDate,jdbcType=DATE} and TotalNum is not null and TotalNum != -2147483648 group by DATADATE ) b on 1=1
